name: Symbiotic (AAMinistry)
description:
Control the spheres by rotating them around each other or in and out. 

Collect the energy orbs with the matching sphere. Collecting an orb with the wrong sphere will decrease your score and unbalance the connection!

Hint: To move across the screen, orbit each sphere in opposite directions at the same time

Controls: 

A/D or Left Stick (left and right) will orbit the orange sphere around the blue sphere.

Left/Right Arrows or Right Stick (left and right) will orbit the blue sphere around the orange sphere.

W/S or Left Stick (up and down) will move the orange sphere away from or towards the blue sphere.

Up/Down or Right Stick (up and down) will move the blue sphere away from or towards the orange sphere.

Esc/Start to pause
